channel.title: R on Codes
channel.description: Recent content in R on Codes

item.title: Using R Blogdown for Site Building
item.description: It’s such a learning experience in setting up a website using github+ terminal + R blogdown + netlify for me. In general, I followed the post from [Alison Hill] (https://alison.rbind.io/post/up-and-running-with-blogdown/). A couple of problems have occured and I have searched very hard to resolve them. R crash whenever I tried to open projects in Mac OS system. Solution: download update R version from (https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/). Now I have Rstudio 1.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
